markdownRemark.html: Every Sunday in the parking of the La Trocha shopping center you will find the largest Car Boot Sales in the area. Selling second hand items from clothes to kitchen wares, incense, plants, flowers, bags, accessories, jewelry etc. The only thing you won't find on the market are food items.

frontmatter.title: Sunday - Coin weekly carboot market
frontmatter.description: Sunday - Coin weekly carboot market - Every Sunday in the parking of the La Trocha shopping center.
frontmatter.address: Edificio Centro Com La Trocha Coin
tags: Top Free Things to do with Kids in Andalusia
